author_name: Muhammad Abdul Hadi Muhammad Abdul Majid
title: Some limitations but nice application overall
comment: Cannot set increment to a count limited to 9999 only other than that very nice and elegant design does what it says.

title: Best counter ever!!!
comment: Please can you in next update make ability to make counter limit (ex. 0-14)

title: Only lacks a setting for increment value
comment: Title says it all. This app lets you put several counters, and has a simple yet elegant design. All that it lacks is a setting for increments for each individual counter. Until they put that, I'll stick to using other counters.

title: Good Practical Tool
comment: Does its job greatly when needed
Good tracker
The only critique I have is the counter doesn't allow for negative values. Beside that, it's great.

title: Generous privacy-respecting developer!
comment: The simple apps are the best. A must-have app to handle any counting need.

title: Fix!
comment: Please fix the force close issue as it force closes as soon as popup from any app (like calendar, messaging etc) is dismissed.. Other than that, best counter app on market :)

title: Perfection!
comment: I love that it doesn't require any privacy it network related permissions!
Does what I expected!

title: Love the design! Would really benefit from a widget.
comment: Great little app, follows Material Design guidelines and works perfectly. Also being able to have several counters is a big positive. However I think a widget would be a great addition and would definitely make it 5 stars!

title: Beautiful design and very practical
comment: I absolutely love the simple and clean design of this counter. Obviously it performs a simple function and it does it very well. I would however suggest allowing the user to add additional counters so they could keep track of multiple things simultaneously. That's my only disappointment with the current build. Otherwise, it's perfect.

title: Time
comment: Just need to add a timestamp register

title: Simple and useful
comment: Would love to have a dark theme though 👍

title: Perfect
comment: Does exactly what it says. Without asking for any weird device permissions
good, is it possible to use it on power button, bcoz with flip cover its not possible to use volume button

title: Just add negative values
comment: Minimal and good. I would add the possibility to reach negative values in settings.

title: Very useful
comment: Thank you. Is there any way to make the volume of the click louder?
Nice and easy

title: Awesome
comment: Good luck

title: Dark theme
comment: The white bright theme consumes battery and doesn't look good at night. Please bring a black theme also

title: One suggestion...
comment: You should make the counters more customisable colour wise and maybe add an option to have multiple counters on the screen at once.

title: Perfeito
comment: Simples e funcional.

title: Best counter I could find
comment: Thanks!

title: No add so giving 5 star
comment: Thanks

title: I like it!
comment: Possible new features: change the vibration pattern for the + and - minus buttons / the ability to remove one of the buttons / don't place them so close together. Basically I want to be able to use it without looking at the screen while being sure of what I'm pressing :)

title: really best counter ever
comment: I can use my BT remote shooter (for selfie stick pictures) as counter button. So when I'm running laps, I dont have to remember how many laps I run and I dont have to press buttons or tap on the screen to add lap... I just press remote sooter button. Thanks!

title: Missing easy counter switch
comment: If you would activate switch by swype among counters would be great.

title: Nice
comment: Nice

title: But need BLACK theme!!!
comment: Simple and easy to use

title: It simply counts.
comment: What more could you ask of an app called Simple Counter? Does at least one thing really, really well.

title: Requested this function months ago
comment: I installed and tried many counters to know which one is the best and I think this one is the outstanding one in the crowd. I just have one wish if they could add an option to change the background theme especially to black where it will save lots of battery in amoled displays.

title: Very good
comment: Good for simple counting tasks.
Very Good..

title: Good one
comment: It works and  vibrates with volume  up down buttons so every  single  click  is single. And time by time see how its gone till the total one wants.
The best

title: Best counter ever
comment: And the best feature is you can use volume buttons to count
Add black theme please!

title: So good
comment: This app makes my job so much easier
Very good

title: Very nice.
comment: No ads.
Really Good :)

title: Perfect
comment: Does just what I need. I would only like to be able to increase the font size.

title: Easiest to use so far
comment: This counter's really simple and clean, I love the interface! The only thing I can complain about is, well, the increment value (+2 or +5 each time), a limit beyond 9999, and some color schemes. Otherwise, keep up the good work!

title: One of the best.
comment: I have been using it for months. Saves all your tallies. Works perfectly.

title: Nice and simple to use
comment: Also give negative number counter
No plans to add negative counting. Sorry.
Simple, no permissions needed

title: Best counter out there
comment: Doesn't over complicate things.

title: Open source and simple!
comment: I really like the simplicity and hoe cleam it is. Not any fancy buttons or flashy backgrounds. The fact that it is so small in size is a great value in my opinion. The simplicity and cleanliness makes it faster and less resource consuming than if it had lots of graphics to load. One more thing, I love that it is open source! Big thumbs up for that :)

title: Fantastic
comment: Simple and Clean

title: Well done
comment: Great job on your first android app. I am very ill at the moment and need to keep track of EVERYTHING, for the sake of consistency. Thus the app comes in handy for me, on a daily basis.

title: Nice one
comment: it's a nice app for counting especially I wantedo it for push ups and squats, would seem better if it had some good colors.

title: Very useful
comment: better than other advanced!! counter applications

title: Great App!!
comment: It's a really great app, but it would be better if it has a confirmation before returning the value to default (the update icon button)
Thanks for you feedback, Douglas! I already have plans to implement this feature in the next version.

title: Awesome
comment: It's great

title: good no nonsense thank you
comment: It is just what is needed a counter nice very good and useful

title: Wow finally
comment: Finally i found the best counter ever.. i can save different counter and no ads.. anyway can you add max counter ? It will be more than great!
Thanks, I'm glad you like the app. Though, not sure what "max counter" means. Can you specify more details?

title: Great app
comment: Very well designed app. Allows multiple counters. And the best is, it's free with no ads.

title: Perfect
comment: Just what I was looking for :) Clean and simple interface, best counter app in the play store that I could find. Awesome work! I'd buy this app if I could, just to support the developer.  One request: is it possible to integrate a daily log of the counting? Since we're saving different counters, keeping a daily record of what we're counting could be a beneficial feature to some. Then we can export this out as CSV file and use the data elsewhere.

title: Dark skin?
comment: Where has dark skin gone?
Yes, unfortunately I had to remove it. Maybe in future some kind of themes will be implemented. But no promises.

title: vibrates, sounds, different counts, no ads
comment: - perfect for cell counting in the lab: different titles can be saved, vibrates and clicks - no ads - volume button can be used for counting (or disabled) which allows e.g. counting in a pocket and getting the tactile feedback via vibration

title: Very interactive :)
comment: Nice app!

title: Good app, very reactive developer
comment: One of the best counters available for tablets and mobiles with bigger screens. Also a very reactive developer, reported a problem in my comments and was fixed within 2 days

title: Fantastic
comment: The best counter app
Quite useful

title: Nice
comment: helps to keep track of no of rounds while jogging

title: Use it to count installations with asthma medicine
comment: Great, simple, free!
Force close every time
This problem has been fixed! Please, update your application.

title: Nice.
comment: Much better with vibrate thank you very much.
